column4: anyhow, if anybody has any vmware experience here..
i am looking in X11 logs
are ALL resolution definitions for X defined in xorg.conf, or is there another file ?
it tells me "no mode of this name" in the X logs
how can i tell my Xwindows to get my monitors settings ?
where do i see the list of monitors i can choose from ?
what is "width required unsupported line pitch" ?

I usually get vertical and horizontal frequencies from specifications from Web for concrete model of monitor, then I input them in /etc/X11/xorg.conf or when doing dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg advanced configuration
i managed to move to 1440x900 but the mouse click doesn't seem to happen in the correct place
